text: The sick man answered Him, “Sir, I have no man to throwThat is right, “throw”. Hey, where a split second could make the difference no one is going to stand on ceremony—when the water started to move there would be a mad scramble; people would be thrown at the water, literally. (The demons would really enjoy themselves, seeing ‘the image of God’ humiliated in that way.) me into the pool when the water is stirred up, but while I am coming another gets in before me.”
